attributes.action: Change the London 2012 Olympic Logo to reflect Britain, Pride, Excellence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: London and the UK as a whole would want a logo or symbol of the games to be proud of long after the games are finished. We feel that we are selling ourselves short on the current logo choice. Something a little more classical (timeless) and in purer colours will last longer and people will associate more readily with it. This falls short of the mark. Please change it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
